tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: From diagnosis to post operation follow up. We never felt we are in hospital.  We were so comfortable.  And everything was so smooth. We were guided and taken care of from time to time. Really good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother's knee replacement surgery has done by Dr Dharmesh. We have very good results, she has relived from knee pain and have active lifestyle.He explained everything in a clear manner. He is very friendly, helpful *** ************** I highly recommended him anyone looking for specialist.
